name: Seekers of the Deep
description:
SEEKERS OF THE DEEP

Assume the role of a cultist or  a zealot as you descend into the depths of the earth. Whether in search of ancient knowledge or to save humanity from the dangers deep below. How far will go before you are claimed by the beings lurking in the darkness.



This game was made within a weeks for the GameAWeek project at University of Europe for Applied Sciences. The theme was 'Procedural Generation'.
